item.title: The Future of Artificial Intelligence: Where Are We Headed?
item.dc:creator: Joseph Anim Darko
item.description:
Artificial Intelligence (AI) refers to the development of computer systems that can perform tasks that typically require human intelligence, such as visual perception, speech recognition, decision-making, and natural language processing. These systems use algorithms and machine learning techniques to analyze and process vast amounts of data, identify patterns, and make predictions or recommendations. AI can...

The post The Future of Artificial Intelligence: Where Are We Headed? appeared first on The New Vibes.
